title: Help! Chevy designer looking for font
content:
Hey everybody,

I'm having a hell of a time identifying a font used in the Silverado 200K mile club, and I could use your collective expertise. Of course we dont have any orignial versions of this logo floating around...

[http://chevy200k.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621134628/http:/chevy200k.com/ "http://chevy200k.com/")

I need to find the typeface used in "Silverado" and "2000000". Any help would be grately appreciated. Thanks!
author: modernlobster

comments.content:
You will get a m uch quicker response to this in the "Type ID" forum--where the really fast type identification experts hang out.

ChrisL

Wait, You work for Chevy but dont have that logo nor their corporate types? This is kinda sad. It really is. Nah, Sorry, Just kidding. :)

' [House Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621134628/http:/www.houseind.com/)', by / from House Industries?

Dav
We only have 2 corporate logotypes, Helvetica and Klavika, and those go out the window for any divisional logo design. I did find it though, it's called Industria. Thanks though.
